text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    258158006Sleep episode
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    55423-8Step count
    8867-4Heart Rate

name: omh-datapoint-type
title: Open mHealth Datapoint Types
description: Omh Datapoint standard codes whch are defined in the schema definitions and used when mapping and searching FHIR resources. ***todo*** complete for all datapoints
